Kuk bụ asụsụ Grassfields Bantu nke Cameroon.
Na ngwụcha afọ 1980s na mmalite afọ 1990s, ụfọdụ ndị si n'obodo Kumfutu (nke bụ obodo Kuk) enweghị afọ ojuju n'ochichi Kuk ma guzobe otu Kumfutu Student Association n'ihi ya
Ndị obodo Kumfutu chọrọ ịnwere onwe ha puo na Kuk, ya mere, ha tụpụtara asụsụ "Kumfutu" ọhụrụ
Otú ọ dị, ka ọ na-erule afọ 2010, ndị Kumfutu adighizi emegide ochichi Kuk.
Ihe banyere Kumfutu bu ihe atụ nke otú mgbanwe asụsụ na Africa na-ejikọtakari  na mkpa maka ọdịiche agbụrụ.
